description: iBook Author documents can also be exported to .PDF and .TXT (plain text) formats for reading on the local computer or other devices.
NOTE: iBooks Author uses the .IBA file extension as the default extension for iBooks designs. However, it also supports the ".book" extension for designs.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .book file in Blurb BookSmart 3.4
images.caption: BOOK file open in Blurb BookSmart 3.4
